name: Hanna Barbera's Cartoon Carnival
summary: Match colors at Huckleberry Hound's Gift Emporium. Catch balloons at The Flintstone's Balloon Ballyhoo. Rescue Scooby from a haunted maze in Scooby-Doo's Adventure Isle. Snatch silly sounds at Yogi Bear's Pic-a-nic Place. Capture stray satellites in The Jetson's Space Race. Test your knowledge in Top Cat's Top Facts. Win and enjoy a classic cartoon clip in full-motion digital video.
